headline: Citigroup Upgrades Linde (LIN) to Buy, Raises Price Target
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is one of the 11 Best Foreign Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On June 30, Citi upgraded its rating on Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) from “Neutral” to “Buy” and raised its price target from $500 to $535. The research firm highlighted the company’s strong execution on price and productivity, along with […]
